data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Guayama, Puerto Rico. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guayama, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Guayama, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Guayama, Puerto Rico to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Guayama, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Jobos
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Jobos, Guayama, Puerto Rico.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Guayama to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Guayama
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary:
the state of Guayama, Puerto Rico has a population of 39,500.

We estimate Guayama has 12,843 people who might know Jesus, 24,504 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,154 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 39,500 souls in Guayama and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
